Russia's Putin says he will consider China for his first trip in new termRussian President Vladimir Putin said late on Tuesday that he will consider China for his first overseas trip during his new presidential term that he secured in weekend election. Tue, 19 Mar 2024 22:45:16 GMT PCXCX5PCIJLQLNRS3B6R2FI3QY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russias-putin-says-he-will-consider-china-his-first-trip-new-term-2024-03-19/Reuters世界欧洲
China's top diplomat meets Australian counterpart in CanberraChina's top diplomat, Foreign Minister Wang Yi, met with his Australian counterpart Penny Wong in Canberra on Wednesday for talks which Australia said would include human rights, tariffs and regional security. Tue, 19 Mar 2024 22:40:55 GMT T2SMF47KCZIENJM4G26Q46UEYQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/chinas-top-diplomat-meets-australian-counterpart-canberra-2024-03-19/Renju Jose世界亚太地区
Trump says he would take 'appropriate action' over Prince Harry visa questionFormer U.S. President Donald Trump on Tuesday said if Prince Harry lied on his visa application about drug-taking Trump would seek to take "appropriate action" if he won November's presidential election, declining to rule out Harry leaving the United States. Tue, 19 Mar 2024 22:37:34 GMT ST3ZL62QVBJMVINNVTD56LYRUI https://www.reuters.com/world/trump-says-he-would-take-property-action-over-prince-harry-visa-question-2024-03-19/Kanishka Singh世界
North Korea leader Kim guides new solid-fuel engine for hypersonic missile, KCNA saysNorth Korean leader Kim Jong Un guided a ground test of a solid-fuel engine for a new type of intermediate-range hypersonic missile as part of a program of developing national defence capability, state news agency KCNA reported on Wednesday. Tue, 19 Mar 2024 22:34:45 GMT ZRBWXBJKMJN4LCI5XFVS6VVJUM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/north-korea-leader-kim-guides-new-solid-fuel-engine-hypersonic-missile-kcna-says-2024-03-19/Reuters世界亚太地区
US to lift Afghan visa limit under Biden, Congress dealU.S. President Joe Biden's administration has reached a compromise deal with Republicans in House of Representatives to lift the number of resettlement visas for Afghans who worked for the United States, U.S. lawmakers said on Tuesday. Tue, 19 Mar 2024 22:31:14 GMT BTV6SUK2ZJOAZDHS7NPFZJHZGA https://www.reuters.com/world/us/us-lift-afghan-visa-limit-under-biden-congress-deal-2024-03-19/Reuters世界美国
US Congress deal bars US funds to UNRWA until March 2025, sources sayAn agreement reached by U.S. congressional leaders and the White House on a massive bill funding military, State Department and a range of other government programs will continue a ban on U.S. funding for UNRWA, the main U.N. agency for Palestinians, until March 2025, two sources said on Tuesday. Tue, 19 Mar 2024 22:03:46 GMT JCZOJP45HZPZBM6K2EJ6HVBB7E https://www.reuters.com/world/us/us-congress-deal-bars-us-funds-unrwa-until-march-2025-sources-say-2024-03-19/Patricia Zengerle世界美国
Collision with NASA spacecraft altered shape of asteroid DimorphosWhen NASA sent its DART spacecraft to slam into the asteroid Dimorphos in 2022, the U.S. space agency demonstrated that it was possible to change a celestial object's trajectory, if needed, to protect Earth. It turns out that this collision changed not only the asteroid's path but its shape as well. Tue, 19 Mar 2024 21:58:23 GMT Y7O3VW42PVPRTHUQQ4COEAZ5NU https://www.reuters.com/technology/space/collision-with-nasa-spacecraft-altered-shape-asteroid-dimorphos-2024-03-19/Will Dunham技术空间
US Air Force says it conducted successful hypersonic weapon testThe U.S. Air Force said on Tuesday it had conducted a successful test of an air-launched hypersonic weapon in the Pacific Ocean. Russia, Ukraine report air attacks in border areasRussia and Ukraine said they repelled air attacks in border areas on Tuesday and Kyiv accused Moscow of pounding one northeastern region with 200 bombs in the past month. Trump draws ire for saying Jews who vote for Democrats hate their religion, IsraelRepublican U.S. presidential candidate Donald Trump drew outrage from the White House, Democrats and leaders of Jewish groups for saying Jewish Americans who vote for Democrats hate their religion and Israel. Trump again conditions US help to NATO allies on their paying 'fair share'Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump reiterated that the United States would only help protect NATO members from a future attack by Russia if its European members spent more on defense.
